metadata.title: SC to hear petitions seeking inquiry into May 9, riots, election results

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 24 (APP):The Supreme Court of Pakistan would hear the petitions on February 28, seeking judicial inquiry of May 9, riots and investigation regarding the election results. A five member constitutional bench headed by Justice Amin Ud Din Khan would take up the case for hearing. The registrar office had issued the cause list for fixation of the case.
